verses.verse: At <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tetrarch <S%G5076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fame <S%G189><s%> Of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3816><s%> To His Servants, <S%G846><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Baptist : <S%G910><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Is Risen <S%G1453><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Works Of Power <S%G1411><s%> Operate <S%G1754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> Having Seized <S%G2902><s%> <S%G3588><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Bound <S%G1210><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Put Him <S%G5087><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Prison, <S%G5438><s%> On Account <S%G1223><s%> Of Herodias <S%G2266><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wife <S%G1135><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> Of His Brother. <S%G846><s%>
<S%G3004><s%> For Said <S%G1063><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> It Is Lawful <S%G1832><s%> For Thee <S%G4671><s%> To Have <S%G2192><s%> Her. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Wishing <S%G2309><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Kill, <S%G615><s%> He Feared <S%G5399><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Multitude, <S%G3793><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Prophet <S%G4396><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Held. <S%G2192><s%>

<S%G1077><s%> But A Birthday <S%G1161><s%> Being Celebrated <S%G71><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Herod, <S%G2264><s%> Danced <S%G3738><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Daughter <S%G2364><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Herodias <S%G2266><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Midst, <S%G3319><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pleased <S%G700><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Herod; <S%G2264><s%>
Whereupon <S%G3606><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Oath <S%G3727><s%> He Promised <S%G3670><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whatever <S%G1437><s%> She Should Ask. <S%G154><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But She <S%G1161><s%> Being Urged On <S%G4264><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%>, Her Mother, <S%G846><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%>, Me, <S%G3427><s%>, She Says, <S%G5346><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> A Dish <S%G4094><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Head <S%G2776><s%> Of John <S%G2491><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Baptist. <S%G910><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was Grieved <S%G3076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King; <S%G935><s%> <S%G1223><s%> But On Account Of <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Oaths <S%G3727><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Reclined With Him At Table <S%G4873><s%> He Commanded It <S%G2753><s%> To Be Given. <S%G1325><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Sent <S%G3992><s%> He Beheaded <S%G607><s%> <S%G3588><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prison. <S%G5438><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was Brought <S%G5342><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2776><s%> His Head <S%G846><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> A Dish, <S%G4094><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Damsel, <S%G2877><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> She Brought It <S%G5342><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> To Her Mother. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G4334><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> Took <S%G142><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Body, <S%G4983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Buried <S%G2290><s%> It; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Told It <S%G518><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Withdrew <S%G402><s%> Thence <S%G1564><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A Desert <S%G2048><s%> <S%G5117><s%> ' Place <S%G2596><s%> Apart. <S%G2398><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Heard Of It <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> On Foot <S%G3979><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cities. <S%G4172><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Saw <S%G1492><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> A Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Moved With Compassion <S%G4697><s%> ' Towards <S%G1909><s%>, Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Healed <S%G2323><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G732><s%> Their Infirm. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3798><s%> And Evening <S%G1161><s%> Having Come <S%G1096><s%> Came <S%G4334><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%>, His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Desert <S%G2048><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Place, <S%G5117><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Time <S%G5610><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> Is Gone By : <S%G3928><s%> Dismiss <S%G630><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds, <S%G3793><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Having Gone <S%G565><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Villages <S%G2968><s%> They May Buy <S%G59><s%> For Themselves <S%G1438><s%> Meat. <S%G1033><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> They Have <S%G2192><s%> To Go Away : <S%G565><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> To Eat. <S%G5315><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> We Have Not <S%G2192><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Fishes. <S%G2486><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Commanded <S%G2753><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> To Recline <S%G347><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Grass, <S%G5528><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Fishes, <S%G2486><s%> Having Looked Up <S%G308><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> He Blessed; <S%G2127><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Broken <S%G2806><s%> He Gave <S%G1325><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Loaves, <S%G740><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds. <S%G3793><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Ate <S%G5315><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Satisfied; <S%G5526><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Took Up <S%G142><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Over And Above <S%G4052><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fragments, <S%G2801><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Hand Baskets <S%G2894><s%> Full. <S%G4134><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And Those Who <S%G1161><s%> Ate <S%G2068><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> About <S%G5616><s%> Five Thousand, <S%G4000><s%> Besides <S%G5565><s%> Women <S%G1135><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Children. <S%G3813><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Compelled <S%G315><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> To Enter <S%G1684><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Go Before <S%G4254><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other Side, <S%G4008><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until He <S%G3739><s%> Should Have Dismissed <S%G630><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds. <S%G3793><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Dismissed <S%G630><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> He Went Up <S%G305><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3735><s%> ' Mountain <S%G2596><s%> Apart <S%G2398><s%> To Pray. <S%G4336><s%> Evening <S%G3798><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Being Come <S%G1096><s%> Alone <S%G3441><s%> He Was <S%G2258><s%> There. <S%G1563><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> Now In <S%G2235><s%> The Midst <S%G3319><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> Was, <S%G2258><s%> Tossed <S%G928><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Waves, <S%G2949><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Contrary <S%G1727><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wind. <S%G417><s%>

<S%G5067><s%> But In The Fourth <S%G1161><s%> Watch <S%G5438><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> Went <S%G565><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%>, Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Walking <S%G4043><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea. <S%G2281><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> Walking <S%G4043><s%> Were Troubled, <S%G5015><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> An Apparition <S%G5326><s%> It Is : <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Through <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> They Cried Out. <S%G2896><s%>

<S%G2112><s%> But Immediately <S%G1161><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G2293><s%> Be Of Good Courage, <S%G1473><s%> <S%G1510><s%> I Am He, <S%G3361><s%> Fear Not. <S%G5399><s%>

<S%G611><s%> And Answering <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> <S%G4771><s%>, It Be Thou, <S%G1488><s%> Bid <S%G2753><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> To Come <S%G2064><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Waters. <S%G5204><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Come. <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Descended <S%G2597><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Walked <S%G4043><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Waters, <S%G5204><s%> To Go <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

<S%G991><s%> But Seeing <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wind <S%G417><s%> Strong <S%G2478><s%> He Was Affrighted, <S%G5399><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Beginning <S%G756><s%> To Sink <S%G2670><s%> He Cried Out, <S%G2896><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Save <S%G4982><s%> Me. <S%G3165><s%>

<S%G2112><s%> And Immediately <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Having Stretched Out <S%G1614><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> Took Hold <S%G1949><s%> Of Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3640><s%> O Thou Of Little Faith, <S%G1519><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Didst Thou Doubt? <S%G1365><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Entered <S%G1684><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> Ceased <S%G2869><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wind. <S%G417><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And Those <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Worshipped <S%G4352><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Truly <S%G230><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Thou Art! <S%G1488><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Passed Over <S%G1276><s%> They Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> Of Gennesaret. <S%G1082><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Recognized <S%G1921><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5117><s%> Of That Place <S%G1565><s%> Sent <S%G649><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4066><s%> That Country Round, <S%G1565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Brought <S%G4374><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2560><s%> Were Ill; <S%G2192><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Besought <S%G3870><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> They Might Touch <S%G680><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Border <S%G2899><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> Of His Garment; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> As Many As <S%G3745><s%> Touched <S%G680><s%> Were Cured. <S%G1295><s%>
